pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos

nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin

pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na

yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa

nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /

phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi

chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud

na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /chen

po stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma

yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis chos nyid

las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /don dam

pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid

las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud

na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa

stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma

myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid

kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa

nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud

na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de

bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de

bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong

pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po myed

pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las

gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi

chos nyid las dud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /yang dag par

spong ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams

kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin

nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /

stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs

rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de

bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam gyi de

bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam gyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i

bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa

rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan

rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na

yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi

de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa

rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa

myed pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa

dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /

ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams

kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed

do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi

chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs
pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las

gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /so so yang dag par

rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa

rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /snying rje chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na

yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid

kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
tshad myed pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la bslabs shing / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis ni lan cig phyir

'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyis ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni dgra bcom pa nyid
thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rang byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de la bslabs
shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems can yongs su smin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa 'di ni tshad myed pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'o/ /de la bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni/ dgra
bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ rang byang chub du mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de
la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can yongs su smyin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /

ke'u shi ka tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi

ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'du shes rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'du byed rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa rgya che

ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i

mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka myig rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di

ltar myig gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rna ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sna rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lce rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /

ke'u shi ka lus rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi

ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka yid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
de ni 'di ltar yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sgra rgya che ba'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sgra'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi

dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dri rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dri'i

sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka ro rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ro'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka reg rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka

chos rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka myig gi rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin
te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rna ba'i rnam par

shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi
dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba

yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa rgya che

ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/

phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa rgya che ba yin te/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'

myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka myig gi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi

dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u

shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs

so/ /ke'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi
'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /

ke'u shi ka myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar

myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/

phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya

che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lce'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi
dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba

yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sa'i khams rgya che ba'i

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/

dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka chu'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
chu'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka mye'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mye'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rlung gi khams rgya che ba'i

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi

dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka nam mkha'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi

ka de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs

so/ /ke'u shi ka ma rig pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi

dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'du byed rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/

dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka mying dang gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
mying dang gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka skye mched drug rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka

reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i

mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni

'di ltar tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sred pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka len pa rgya che ba'i phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/

dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka srid pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
srid pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka skye ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rga shi rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs

so/ /ke'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/

dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni
'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi
ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka phyi stong pa nyid rgya che

ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i

mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe

na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/

dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka chen po stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa

nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid

rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/

phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi
dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u

shi ka dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong

pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka chos

thams cad stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa
nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /

ke'u shi ka myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myi dmyigs
pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs

so/ /ke'u shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba rgya che ba'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka dbang po rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/

dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka stobs rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
stobs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /

ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i
lam gyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka

bsam gtan rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi sngon gyi mtha'
myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka tshad myed pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshad myed pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya che ba'i

phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon gyi mtha'
myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par thar pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che
ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon

pa myed pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs

so/ /ke'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin
kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka myi 'jigs pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka so so yang dag

par rig pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa'i sngon gyi

mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka snying rje chen po rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba

yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rgya

che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sngon gyi mtha'
myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi
ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam
gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus

myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba yin te/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /ko'u shi ka gzugs
tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /
ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ gzugs tshad myed do/ /
gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba'i tshad

kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ tshor ba tshad myed do/ /tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'du shes tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i

tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du 'du shes kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ 'du shes tshad myed do/ /'du shes tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'du byed tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar

'du byed kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du 'du byed kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/

'du byed tshad myed do/ /'du byed tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /
ke'u shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa tshad myed do/ /rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka myig tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du myig gi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /nam

mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ myig tshad myed do/ /myig tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka rna ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka

de bzhin du rna ba'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha'i tshad myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba tshad myed do/ /rna ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka sna tshad myed pa'i
phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka

'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du sna'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ sna tshad myed do/ /sna tshad myed pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka lce tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du lce'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha'
tshad myed pa'i phyir/ lce tshad myed do/ /lce tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka lus tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni
dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du lus kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ lus tshad myed do/ /lus tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka yid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
ltar yid kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du yid kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad
myed pa'i phyir/ yid tshad myed do/ /yid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i
tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ gzugs tshad myed do/ /gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka sgra tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
ka de ni 'di ltar sgra'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du sgra'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha'
tshad myed pa'i phyir/ sgra tshad myed do/ /sgra tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka dri tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dri'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed

do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du dri'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ dri tshad myed do/ /dri tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka ro

tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ro'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka

'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du ro'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ ro tshad myed do/ /ro tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab

ltar reg gi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du reg gi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/

'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin

du chos kyi tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ chos tshad myed do/ /chos tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka myig gi rnam par shes pa
tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni

dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du myig gi rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i

phyir/ myig gi rnam par shes pa tshad myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka

'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed do/ /rna ba'i

rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /

ke'u shi ka de bzhin du sna'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad

kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka lus kyi rnam

'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa

tshad myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /ke'u shi ka myig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad kyang dmyigs su myed de/ nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa

myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmyigs su myed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin
