de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/

'dzam bu'i gling gi myi de dag gi myi de dag las sangs rgyas la mos pa myi phyed pa dang / ldan pa dang / chos la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / dge 'dun la mos pa phyed pa dang / ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas la nem nur myed pa

dang / chos la nem nur myed pa dang / dge 'dun la nem nur myed pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang / chos la shin tu rton pa dang / dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de lta bu ni ches

nyung ngo / /de bas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches

nyung ngo / /de bas kyang phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang

bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang byang chub tu spyod par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sngon 'khor ba na

'khor ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang / chos ma thos pa dang / dge 'dun bsnyen ma bkur ba dang / sbyin pa ma byin pa dang / tshul khrims ma bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa ma bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus ma brtsoms pa

dang / bsam gtan ma bsgoms pa dang / shes rab ma bsgoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma

bsgoms pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / chen

po stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms

pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid

ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa
dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dbang po rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms

pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan rnams ma
thos ma bsgoms pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / myi 'jigs pa

rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / byams pa chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / snying rje chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thos ma

bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can la las sangs rgyas la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / chos la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / dge

'dun la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ de bas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang mthar kyis

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i

gling gi myi rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa

ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur

pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo / /de bas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhus par gyur pa ches

nyung ngo / /de bas kyang bsam pa dag pa byang chub tu spyod pa ni ches nyung bar rig par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka myi rnams lta zhog gi/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las byang chub kyi phyogs

kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa

bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'dod chags

dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu spyod pa

lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur pa nyid dang / rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

nem nur myed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la nem nur myed pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams la mar shes pa dang / phar shes pa dang / dge sbyong du shes
pa dang / bram zer shes pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la

snyoms par 'jug pa dang shes rab sgom pa dang / gso' sbyin la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa la kha na ma tho bar 'du shes shing / rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin du myi rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bdag myed par 'du

shes pa dang / myi gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du mngon par dga' ba myed par 'du shes pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srogs chags las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ brgya byin kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa

dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du/

rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong bar

gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / rang byang chub tu zhugs pa de lta bu ni shin tu nyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las bla na

myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni de bas kyang ches nyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin

te/ ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar kyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa thob pa dang / 'dod

chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor pa lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor

ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ de bas

kyang gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo / /
ke'u shi ka ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de la phal cher nyan thos dang

rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/

shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can

tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de bas gcig gam gnyis shig /phyir myi

ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/

nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs
mkhas pa dang / myi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /

ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang

sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma'
ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung

gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig
gam gnyis shig /phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba

mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis

bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi/ spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/

bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal

cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa bsam pa zhan pa/ mos

pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma

snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam

gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /

ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi de las

phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam
pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams

gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/
de las gcig gam gnyis shig /phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
ka bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi
ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/

de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/
bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /ke'u shi ka de bas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag myur zhing / bde bar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/ yang dang yang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa

'di la mnyan par bya'o/ /gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /klag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bzung zhing / bcang ba dang /

klog cing kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas zhing bris te/ me tog dang / gdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /

ba dan mang pos rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /dge ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus te/ de dag kyang gzung bar

bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa

nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang /

dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam
par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo

brgyad dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gang ji snyed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de dag kyang gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /klags par bya'o/ /kun chub par
bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltar shes par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub

sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong

pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong

pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas

kyi chos tshad myed pa dag la bslab par mdzad kyi/ bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis chos gzhan

tshad myed pa'i bar du yang bdag cag gi ston pa ste/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun

tu zhugs pa rnams kyis bstan pa yang 'di yin te/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob

pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la

slob slob pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la

slob slob pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob slob

pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob

slob pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob

pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob

slob pa dang / dbang po rnams la slob slob pa dang / stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i

bden pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams

la slob slob pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la slob slob pa dang / mngon par
shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob slob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / myi 'jig pa rnams

la slob slob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / byams pa chen po la slob slob pa dang / snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la

slob slob pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ /pha rol tu
phyin to/ /pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro/ /ke 'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa

yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas

dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par

bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang

lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang

sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya te/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin

gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang

sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten

par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang /

lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka phyi

stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis phyi

nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad kyi rten

yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis chen po stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ ke'u shi ka chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin

no/ /de dag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di
ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'dus ma byas

stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/

lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos

dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni

nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye

dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i

bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha

dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos

dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la

brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang

myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i

bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gi dbang po rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dbang po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin

te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag

ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa

la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang

myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis bsam gtan rnams brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bsam

gtan 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis tshad myed pa rnams la brten

par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka tshad myed pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin

no/ /de dag gis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnam par thar

pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis mthar kyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la brten par bya ste/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad

kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang /

rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brten par bya ste/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar

gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad

kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la brten par bya te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di

dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis myi 'jig pa rnams la

brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka myi 'jig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye

dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la brten par bya te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis snying rje chen po la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka snying rje chen po 'di ni nyan thos

dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams

la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi

dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad

kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyis bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/ de la nam

'tsho'i bar du mye tog dang / lha rdzas kyi mye tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi

gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka

de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la yang

rgya cher ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang myi 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil

snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams de ches mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs

kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad

phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam mtsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi mye tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na

bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyis sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas nas/ ke'u shi ka de la ji
snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed

cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang myi 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs

kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog

gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las

byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi mye tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha

rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur

bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang

ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te 'dzin pa dang /

'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan

dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bskur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gis/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/

stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi mye tog dang /

lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan

mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa

bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas

shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan

dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bur de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas

yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /
lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/

phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar

gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /

tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / mye tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed / phu dud du byed/ mchod

par byed na/ bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo

gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad

phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam mtsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi

gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i

bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed kun chub par byed / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / mye tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil

snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs

su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag las sems can re res/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir rin po

che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag byas te/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha

rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par

byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing bzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byas te/ de la mye tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/

phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de nyid bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis pas ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bskur stir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma

snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag

tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye

ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par

bgyis pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod

pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi

phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs

kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res

kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la

bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /
lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang phyogs kyi
'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du

rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi

phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs

kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis phu dud du bgyis mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa
de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar

dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas

kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang /

shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las/ sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod

pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas

kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna

tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa
de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad

phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza'

dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub byang

gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i

slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi

phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs

kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems

can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag

la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /

lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun

las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang /

lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs
kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar dgongs/ de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams
mang du 'phel ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka mang ngo / /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ bsod nams ches
mang du 'phel lo/ /de'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/ 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi

dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa

nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang

bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal ba dang / kun
'byung ba dang / 'gogs pa dang / lam bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin
thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so/ /de ni sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste/ de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur te/ phyin to/ /phyin par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu dgu pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi
bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris shing / glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / glog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin
du yid la byed cing / gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim
gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad myed grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa/

myed dpag tu myed par 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/

phyi stong pa nyid do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa las byung ba ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

las byung ba ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/
dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/
yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dbang po rnams so/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ stobs rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bsam gtan rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mtshan ma myed pa rnams so/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
smon pa myed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ myi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/
byams pa chen po'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ snying rje chen po'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sems can yongs su smyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o/ /ke'u shi ka

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /

ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ theg pa chen po'o/ /ke'u shi ka

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

'di bris te/ glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang / bcang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod

nam mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs

dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar myi 'gro/ rgyur yang nye bar myi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du/
sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro/ /chos dkon mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro/ /de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed

pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig

rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam
gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams

'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'jig rten

du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byams
pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad shes pa
nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de srid du rgyal rigs che
zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rig che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung

bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams

dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs ris kyis lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs

lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snang ba'i lha rnams

'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur

ro/ /dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten

du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu

che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig

rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar

'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba yod do/ /bla na myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yod do/ /sems can yongs su smin pa yod do/ /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams

dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams

dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi lha rnams dang / tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang dge ba'i lha rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang /

tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / myi che ba'i lha rnams dang / myi

gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og myin gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya'o/ /grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bya'o/ /grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag par bya'o/ /'grogs po dag shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub par bya'o/ /grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klag pa dang / kun

chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid byas pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi tshul rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro/ /grogs

po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la/ grogs po dag chos kyi tshul rgyun ma chad de/ grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa

nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar

'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig
rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams
'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams
'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
pa myed pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig
rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig
