rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang thab mo bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang tshams sngal
lo snyam na/ de'i tshe ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis soms la kha ton gyis shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang / des lha ma yin gyi bsam
pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa de dag zlob shing / rnam par phel bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/ nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar mthong

na yang / ke'u shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang / de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la mos pas/ lha'i gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa na de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi

bu mo gang yang su yang rung ste/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ mthar kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /ma byon pa'i dus
kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs
shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so/ /
brgya byin kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na

myed pa'i rig sngags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o/ /dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka 'di
ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen po'o/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na myed pa'i rig sngags so/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ma
byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs

shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
rig sngags 'di yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzugs myed
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten

na yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod
pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten
na yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod
pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan
nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod
pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa
yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na
yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mthar kyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes
pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ snying
rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na
yod pa yin/ de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos nyid 'jig rten na
yod pa yin/ chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos skyon myed pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten
na yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang byang chub
'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
'jig rten na yod pa yin// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' yod na/ dge ba bcu'i
las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzugs myed
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig
rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid
'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags
su yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags
su yod pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod
pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig
rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags
su yod pa yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa
'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo
rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod
pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na
gdags su yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'jig rten na
gdags su yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin no/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/ rtsi dang rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad gdags su yod do/ /ke'u shi ka de
bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/ dge ba'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /

rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsi thams cad gdags su yod do/ /slob pa dang / myi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad kyang gdags su yod do/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe na yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong

pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma

dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la

spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran

pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad myed pa
rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam

par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams

la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / myi 'jig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du myi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa
yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de yang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed
pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
'am rigs bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang
ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smyin pa ma gtogs par dug gis dus byed par myi 'gyur ro/ /mtshon gyis dus byed par myi 'gyur
ro/ /myes dus byed par myi 'gyur ro/ /chus dus byed par myi 'gyur ba nas/ nad brgya rtsa gcig gi bar gyis dus byed par myi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang blon pos gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las/ gal
te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing / rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de la glags tshol ba de dag gis glags myi rnyed de/ rgyal po'i bu dang /
rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi
brjid dang / mthus de ltar sems so/ /gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing / rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de la rgyal po'i bu 'am/
rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing / dga' bar bya bar sems dpar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag /snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems nye
bar gzhag pa'i phyir te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul
bzhin du yid la byed pa ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam yang dge ba
bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur te/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / dran pa
nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam
rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar
pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jig pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /de sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par nam yang sems can dmyal bar myi skye/ byol song
gi skye gnas su myi skye/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du myi skye'o/ /de nam yang yan lag nyams pa can du myi 'gyur/ nam yang dbul po'i rigs su myi skye/ smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ smye sha
can gyi rigs sam/ mgar ba 'am/ phyag dar ba 'am/ shen pa 'am/ phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/ dmangs rigs su myi skye ste/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang byang chub
sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par byed/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byas te/ de dag nam bla na myed pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ tshe 'di'i yon tan dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu'o// // de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba/ glags blta ba'i bsam pa can brgya tsam zhig /bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu brgya po glags blta ba'i bsam pa can
'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/ de la bdag gis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pas/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das
kyi drung du dong nas/ bar chad byed par myi 'gyur bar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ji snyed bzung ba de dag kha ton du bya'o snyam nas/ de
nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du brjod do/ /de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun

tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/

de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong na de ci'i rgyu

zhig snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni
lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas/ de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ nga la g.yas phyogs
su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam la yang dkar po'i sems dang
ldan pa ma mthong ste/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa glags blta ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/ 'khor 'dir
'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i
nang na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ zhe sdang ba'i sems sam/ klags blta ba'i bsam bas nye bar 'gro ba ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang /

'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba

dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba

dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed
cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /sha
ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs
pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang /
lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams
cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin

dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di

ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam

mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams

cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi

dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams
cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi

dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding

dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang

bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag
thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri

za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ /de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon tu gyur/ 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa las 'dir ni gdon myi za
bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis/ de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
ste/ bar chad bya'o snyam du bdud sdig to can gyis/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang
po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la bdud
sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi rnam par bkod pa 'di ni rgyal po bim bi sa ri'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam myi phod/ rgyal po sde rab tu
'pham byed dang / shAkya rnams dang / lid tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam myi phod de/ bdud sdig to can 'di ni yun ring po nas bcom
ldan 'das la yang glags lta zhing / glags tshol/ sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la yang gtse ba'i bsam pa can yin gyis/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
yang dag par bsam par bya'o/ /dran pas brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsams te/ dran pas gsal bar
brjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin kyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig can de dag lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir
log go/ /de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og myin gyi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / na bza' mang po mngon par sprul
nas/ bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /
'dzam bu'i gling gi myi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring por spyod par gyur cig /'dzam bu'i gling gi myi 'di dag ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par yang myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o/ /
'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon
mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur zhe'o/ /phyogs gang na rigs kyi
bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas
shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'og myin gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ke'u shi ka de de bzhin
no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
ro/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang
ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so/ /phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar ngas shes so/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po mngon par
sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lhas klags myi rnyed do/ /bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am
rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de ni ston pa 'am/ ston pa dang mtshungs
pa tsam du bdag cag sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la
bgyi ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin
no/ /de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang
gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
las/ le'u nyi shu gcig go// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa'i mying yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/

de ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/

de ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod

pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong

pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/

de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi myi yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mying

yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /de ltar

dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams kyi
mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dbang po rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar stobs rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar byang chub kyi yan
lag rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yang yongs
su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar tshad myed
pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mying yang yongs
su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams
kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /ji ltar
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mying yang
yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar snying rje chen po'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang /
mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o/ /kun tu 'dren pa'o/ /dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma
bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ci snyams du sems/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin
nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam
gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji
ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su
bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis
su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson
'grus ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha
rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa
yin no/ /gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs
pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis
pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji
ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims/ tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos
pa'i bzod pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul

gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs
pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs gnyis su myed pa'i
tshul dang / tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig
gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lce gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid gnyis
su myed pa'i tshul dang / gzugs gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sgra gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dri gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ro gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / reg gnyis su
myed pa'i tshul dang / chos gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par
shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i
tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig
gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul
dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mye'i khams
gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
ma rig pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mying dang gzugs gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / skye
mched drug gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sred pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / len pa gnyis su myed pa'i
tshul dang / srid pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / skye ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rga shi gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa

nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin
stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs

pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / stobs rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / tshad
myed pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul
dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen
po gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lan cig
phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub gnyis su
myed pa'i tshul dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis so/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du shes gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam
par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna gnyis su ma mchis
pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sgra gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dri gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ro gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
reg gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i rnam
par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi
rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji
ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis
su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma
mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chu'i khams
gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mye'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rlung gi khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nam mkha'i khams gnyis su ma

mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar

rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mying dang gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye mched drug gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar reg pa gnyis su ma

mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sred pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar len pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar srid pa gnyis su ma

mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rga shi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /

ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su

ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid

gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus
byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i

tshul dang / ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid

gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi dmyigs
pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
dang / ji ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yang dag
par spong ba rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dbang po rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
ji ltar stobs rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshad myed
pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad gnyis su ma mchis
pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzungs
kyi sgo rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar snying rje chen po gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis
su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyir
myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lam gyi
rnam pa shes pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis lags// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong

ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du
shes dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed
de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig ni myig gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba ni rna bas stong

ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna ni snas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce ni lces stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus ni lus

kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid ni yid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid dang
pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis

su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sgra ni sgras stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sgra dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /dri ni dris stong ste/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ro ni ros stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ro dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su
myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /reg ni reg gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar reg dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /chos ni chos
kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes
pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna

ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i

rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas

stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe

na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid

kyi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg

pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su

myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus

kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid

kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ myig gi

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed

de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ yid kyi

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sa'i khams ni sa'i

khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mye'i khams ni mye'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mye'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa

'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar

myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i

khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ma rig pa ni ma rig pas

stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du

byed dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su

byar myed do/ /mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar mying dang gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis

stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/ de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sred pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /len pa ni len pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar len pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su

myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar srid pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rga shi ni rga shis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rga shi dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de

gnyis su byar myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni

phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de

ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis

su byar myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang

tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa

stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar

chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid

dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyin pa

'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /

dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de

gnyis su byar myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su

byar myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed

do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed

do/ /dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di

ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /lam ni lam gyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lam dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams dang pha rol tu phyin

pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshad myed pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar

pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa

myed pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa

'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de

gnyis su byar myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnam

ni gzungs kyi rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa

rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag

par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong
