pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di

ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis

su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis

su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de

ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi

ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de

la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi

ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang

dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /

ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod

du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i
mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de
ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis
su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis myi
khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad

do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis
su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcwo lnga pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ de la bslabs pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/
bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das

gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ der lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la
mchod par bgyid de/ nam bdag der ma mchis shing bstan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe/ yang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing / sum
bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing / phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

'di bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha ton du bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa der/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding

dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo / /nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bgyi zhing 'dud pa bgyis nas/
slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ste/ de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir

gyur to/ /rgyur gyur to/ /rkyen du gyur to/ /yongs su bsgrub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ cha de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/
bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe/ 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang / yang dag par rjes su myi

mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos
su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma
mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma
mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma

ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis
pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi

nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni smos
su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas
stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan
ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/

rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa
ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang
gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs

pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni

smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan
'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan
'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dbang
po rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du
ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du
ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa rnams ni
smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
thar pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das

mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags

ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni
mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod
du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma
mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma
mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thams
cad shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni
smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni
smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos myi

ston te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa de'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas
chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar

phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub phyogs kyi de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho nub kyi phyogs
mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ /mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du
brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa gsungs te/
bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang myi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo/ /'di las byung ba
ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa
dang / chos rab tu byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal
mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing / mye
tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud
dang / mchod pa bgyis par yang myi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /
bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
bgyid cing / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa des ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma

mchis par bgyi'o/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par

rig par bgyi'o de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to/ /'chang ngo / /klog go/ /kun chub par bgyid do/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa bris pa de la yang mye tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang na

bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni

'jig pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o/ /nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun

chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid pa des

ni/ gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la rten na/ de rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal

po la rten pas/ sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas/ de dag gis 'jigs par myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la rten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la rten pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na/ mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags
pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bas ni/ bdag gis cha de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/ /'di las byung ba ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi'o/ /'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/ /'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa bcwo brgyad do/ /'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ /
'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bris shing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang /
phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa de dag tu myi 'am myi ma lags pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba rnams kyis/ glags rnyed par myi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las/
theg pa gang yang rung bas/ mthar kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa

ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis

pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni/ sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po myi dpogs rin chen ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i

yon tan gyis rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che de gang dang gang du bzhag pa der myi ma lags pa rnams kyis glags myi rnyed do/ /myi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am bud myed kyang

nor bu rin po che de bstan na/ myi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzig brjid myi bzod de/ myur du 'pho zhing myi gnas so/ /mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/

mkhris pa de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung gis mnar pa'i lus la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ rlung de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ bad kan

de yang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la/ nor bu rin po che de btags na/ 'dus pa'i bro de yang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par myi 'phel lo/ /nub mo ni snang bar bgyid pa'o/ /tsha ba'i dus na ni

nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du zhugs pa'i sa phyogs de bsil bar gyur to/ /grangs ba'i dus na rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhags pa'i sa phyogs de dro bar bgyid do/ /nor bu rin po che chen po de dag sa'i

phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de yang ha cang yang myi dro/ /ha cang yang myi grang zhing / ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ /nor bu rin po che chen po de dag sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i sa'i phyogs der/
sbrul lam sdig pa la stsogs pa gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar myi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am/ bud myed la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/

des de mthong ma thag tu dug de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa 'am/ bud myed la la zhig 'brum bus btab

bam/ myig rab rib can du gyur te/ myig gis nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad cig byung ba las de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po btags na/ de dag gi 'brum bu

'am/ rab rib bam/ myig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa

'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gang te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ chab rnyogs pa can gyi nang du stsal na/ de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/ /gal te

nor bu rin po che chen po de gos sngon pos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos bkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de

yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dmar pos bkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ gos dkar

pos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ gos leb rgan gyis dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du

'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ shel gyis kha dog gi gos kyis dkris te/ chab kyis nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de dag dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/

nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /chab de la rnyog pa mchis pa yang nor bu rin po che chen po des 'dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin

po che chen po de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang lha rdzas gyis nor bu rin po che chen po de

dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyis 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du

sems/ nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/ 'on te nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams la yang yod/ brgya byin gyis smras so/ /btsun pa dga' bo/ /nor bu rin po che chen po

de ni lha rdzas te/ btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams la/ nor bu rin po che gang yod pa de dag ni chung zhing lci/ lha rdzas kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gis

myi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni/ lha rdzas kyis nor bu rin po che'i grangs sam/ cha 'am
bgrang ba 'am/ dpe 'am/ rgyur yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod

la la zhig gi nang du stsal stsal pa las/ snod de nas phyung yang snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchis par 'gyur te/ gzhan yang snod de la mos pa bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis lus sam/ sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa myi las gyur pa 'am/ myi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams

cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyis pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /bcom

ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni

tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta

ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan

'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang nang

stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi stong pa

nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid

kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chen po stong pa nyid gyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung

de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad

ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon

tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /

bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dor ba myed

pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag

kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig
brjod par bgyi ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das dngos po

myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid

kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dran pa

nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan
lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan

'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa

rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dbang po rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dbang po
rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das stobs lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / stobs
rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed
cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan

bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / bsam gtan rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa

bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshad myed pa rnams kyis yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / tshad myed pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs
myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de

dag kyang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku

gdung de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yon tan ni tshad

ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das myi
'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do/ /
bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de

dag kyang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku

gdung de dag kyang / snying rje chen po'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi

yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes

pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi
snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

sku gdung de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / de bzhin nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
kyi/ yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/

chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings
kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig

brjod par bgyi ste/ chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos myi 'gyur ba nyid gyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan lta ji snyed

cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon

tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bag chags

kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/

rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das myi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon

tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ myi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / myi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i

sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod

pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye ba myi 'gag pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa dbri ba dang / bsnan pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni

pha rol tu phyind pa 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
ni pha rol tu phyind pa chos nyid kyi snod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'o/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las
'das kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /gzhan yang stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur yongs su gtams

pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bu gtams pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs

bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa

mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa yang /

dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' myi dmyigs shing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi

lha 'am/ mtshe ma'i lha 'am dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mying dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal kyi mthar 'byung ste/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / klags shing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ ting nge

'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /

phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma

dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su

rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par

spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan

bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par

'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mngon
par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /lus de dag gi sems can yongs su smyin par bgyid par 'gyur te/
'khor los bsgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam
tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smyin par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub
sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes
pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/
glo ba ma mchis pa yang ma mchis/ mchod par myi 'tshal pa yang ma lags/ gzungs bar myi 'tshal ba yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi

bu mo rnams kyis/ rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyi na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bstsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams tshad dang

grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyis sku dang /
ye shes kyis skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing / mchod par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzungs bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan
la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kyi khams grangs dang / tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/ chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
bsgom par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa 'di gzungs bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas chos rnams

kyis chos nyid gang lags she na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi

ye shes dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma

dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

nyid kyi ye shes dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gyi ye shes dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan
lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad myed pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /

gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

bcu'i ye shes dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i

chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / myi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyis ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi
ye shes dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/

de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis

pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ de ni 'dus

ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cing byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas so/ /'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cing 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji
snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro 'das pa'i dus kyi

rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cing byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na/ rang sangs rgyas ji snyed

cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rang byang chub thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang tshad myed pa'i tshul dang / dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs myed pa'i

tshul dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i tshul dang / len pa myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dor ba myed pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba myed pa'i tshul dang / bsnan pa myed pa'i tshul dang /

blang ba myed pa'i tshul dang / spangs pa myed pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/
mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma myed pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ myi dge

ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/

rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/

brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa
rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa 'di 'tshal te/ sems can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sems can du gdags par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /bdag tu dmyigs pa
ma mchis so/ /sems can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /srog tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'gro bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /gso' bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /skyes bur dmyigs pa
ma mchis so/ /gang zag du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /shed can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /shes bdag tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /byed pa por dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor ba por dmyigs pa ma
mchis so/ /shes pa por dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /mthong ba por dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'du shes su dmyigs
pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /myig du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /snar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /
lcer dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sgrar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /drir dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /
ror dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /reg du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /chos su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /myig gi rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma
mchis so/ /sna'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs
pa ma mchis so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg
par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs
pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus

te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /
sa'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /chu'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /mye'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rlung gi khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha'i
khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /ma rigs par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes par

dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /mying dang gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /skye mched drug du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sred par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /len par dmyigs
pa ma mchis so/ /srid par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /skye bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rga shir dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par

dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /nang stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyi stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid du

dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /chen po stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du
dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs
pa ma mchis so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang gi

mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs
pa ma mchis so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /yang dag par spongs ba rnams su dmyigs pa ma
mchis so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /dbang po rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /stobs rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su
dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan rnams su dmyigs
pa ma mchis so/ /tshad myed pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /

mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams su
dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /myi
'jigs pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /snying rje chen por dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmyigs
pa ma mchis so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /dgra bcom
pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang byang chub du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /byang chub tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas su
dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmyigs pa ma mchis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmyigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di
ltar gang gis dmyigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmyigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmyigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka

de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyod pas des byang chub kyang myi dmyigs na/ sangs rgyas
lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lta 'di ci smos/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
kyi/ de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la myi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun

la'ang / de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa'ang myi dmyigs/ gtong ba 'ang myi dmyigs/ len pa 'ang myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyang myi dmyigs tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang myi dmyigs

tshul khrims ngan pa'ang myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa 'ang myi dmyigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa 'ang myi dmyigs gnod sems kyang myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyang myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa 'ang myi dmyigs/
le lo yang myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'khrug pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyang myi dmyigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes rab

'chal pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /ke'u shi ka 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi

dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus myi dmyigs

pa'i tshul dang / yid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dri myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ro myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / reg myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
chos myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /

lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi

'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las

byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi

'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mye'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams myi

dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i

tshul dang / sred pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid

myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i

tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa

nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi

mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /

dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa
bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po lnga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad myed pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myed pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i

sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs
kyi sgo thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi dmyigs
pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /

lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos/ bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

brtson 'grus brtsom pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan
la snyoms par 'jug pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la

rnam par lta ba'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs

can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram/ bye brag myi dmyigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs

su 'gro bar zad do/ /ke'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la yang khyad par ram/
bye brag myi dmyigs so/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan mu

ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / glegs bam

du bgyid te/ bcangs pa dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur

stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/ gzhan du stsal na/ de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas
na khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/ me tog

dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil bsnyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod
pa byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te/ bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo

la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa bas/
gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam gzhan stsal na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang / don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/
sems can gyi ris na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ma mchis pa rnams kyi slad du/ thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis
brlabs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la las/ chung du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la/ mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang
dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu

mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas na/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil

snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan byin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am
rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan
