gyi drung du song ste/ bshad cing bstan pa dang / brjod cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas
bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo/ /bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di la shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba myed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la slabs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams

kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa mtshungs

par spyod pa de dag kyang / phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na myed de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing /

nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu thob bo 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las
bslabs shing / rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs so 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/

rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan

dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /

phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka des don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/

gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byas ste/ brten cing rnam par spyod par bya snyam na/ ke'u shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/

tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / myi dang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na nga dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams

te/ de ltar yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis/ mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la/ rim gro dang / bkur bstir dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te/ brten cing rnam par spyod par

bya'o/ /snyam du bsams so/ /ke'u shi ka chos de 'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/ rim gror

byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas pa'i rnam par spyod na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /

gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ji smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs

kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang /

phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so/ /byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ /ke'u shi ka de lta bas na/
byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /
phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /
rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las brgya byin le'u
nyi shu gsum mo// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi
sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus/ de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/
gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs
bam klag pa 'am/ bri ba 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos
gang la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo slob cing / yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par

gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob

pa dang / thob par 'gyur pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang /
'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa

dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya

bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid

dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed

pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong

pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes
pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / 'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos te/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las

rgya cher bstan to/ /de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka sems can gcig gcig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gzhag na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches
mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod
pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no/ /ke'u shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i
sems can ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ji smos/ ke'u shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig gcig rang byang chub la gzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /
rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can cig
gcig bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun myi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /
lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ /ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /ke'u shi ka rnams grangs des na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/

bdud dang bcas pa/ tshang pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling
gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/
brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam bris pa 'am/ bklags pa 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /
'thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /
'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par tshangs brgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas

stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /

chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spongs ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par

thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
gzungs kyis sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang /

byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang brgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am
rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ klags pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar
shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad brgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i
rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /

tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i
lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i
lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu
mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya noms snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched
kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod
do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod
do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba
rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyis yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar
pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams
yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs gyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /
snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /
dgra bcom pa yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig
phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ /la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems
rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nam
ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams brgya cher bstan te/ de dge la bslabs shing / rigs
kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur
ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par
gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa

stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang brgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi
bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klags pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches
mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/
rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul
dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod
do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha
rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha
rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /

phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma
byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /
chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /
dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po
rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /
bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /
gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po rnams
yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cing phyir 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa
rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba
bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ /de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /
bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag
pa dang / bri ba dang / kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams brgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur
ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi
'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa ba rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob
par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par
'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang

tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang /

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang
pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed
pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi
'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang
snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang brgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klags pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i
rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyis lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gis lha rnams yod do/ /

tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /

che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnams shes mtha' yas
skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /
don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa
stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /
yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
brgyad yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub
yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /
phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/
ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs gyis bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo la las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams/ de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par
zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir
'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /
'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa
myed pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par
mthar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par
shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/
sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan te/ ke'u shi ka /rnams grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klags pa dang / bris pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas de'i bsod nams ches mang du
'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka /de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag
yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing
mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i

lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan kyi lha rnams

yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod

do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che

ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi

lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin

skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong

pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par

spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /

bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa

nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu

yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi
'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka /stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang /

kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag
la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob

par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /

'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub

sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /

chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa

nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam

yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen

po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan te/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che
zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams

yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams

yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /

tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /

myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched

kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /

nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas

stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan

rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams

yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /

phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong

ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/
dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar

gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton

bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs
shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur

ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo

thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i

skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs

par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid

dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams

cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi

dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /

bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang

dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa

gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton

du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya
cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris

kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /

tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod

do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams

yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /

nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha

rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa

stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin

stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge

'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod

do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs

kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs bu 'am/ rigs

kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo

gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra

bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong

pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam

yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /

myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs

rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang /

kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/

de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum

cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /

tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang

dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed

che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha

rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi

lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas

stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong

pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan

lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams

yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i

'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod

do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems

can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/

ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du

'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag

yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur

to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas
kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par
gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /

chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong

pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags

pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba

chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang / rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to/ /de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba

rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams

yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /

tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i

lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams

yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye

mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid

stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid

yod do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /
stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yod do/ /

gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /

smon pa myed pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag

par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /

dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams
yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams

yod do/ /ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am
rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu

'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni

'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ /

'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi
'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub

thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par 'gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na myed pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa

nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang

po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen

po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /

rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /

tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams

yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che ba'i

lha rnams yod do/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /

gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha

rnams yod do/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus
